sms_action_select_dropdown_types_group.description: Label given to the SMS types group in the dropdown used to select SMS messages.

sms_first_to_last.description: Shows which sms messages are currently being displayed.

sms_first_to_last_of_total.description: Shows which sms messages are currently being displayed including the total.

sms_empty.description: Displayed when there are no messages

sms_edit_tooltip.description: Tooltip shown on the sms message edit button

sms_dialog_field_numbers_placeholder.description: Placeholder value for sms dialog numbers field

sms_dialog_segment_help.description: Explains how SMS concatenation works to the user.

sms_mark_read_partial_error.description: Shown when there is an eror marking sms as read

sms_box_full.description: Shown to the user when their message box is full.

sms_read.description: Shown when an sms message has been read

sms_unread.description: Shown when an sms message has not been read

options_labels_general_routerUrl.description: Router URL field on the app options page.

options_labels_general_username.description: Username field on the app options page.

options_labels_general_password.description: Password field on the app options page.

options_button_save.description: Save button on the app options page.

options_error_ping.description: Error message displayed when a connection to the router URL can't be established. Used on the app options page.

validation_tag_input_number.description: Error message shown when a non-number is inputted in a tag input where only numbers are allowed.

validation_tag_input_required.description: Error message shown when a tag input is required and was left blank.

icon_picker_button.description: Text on the button for opening icon pickers

icon_picker_title.description: Title for the icon picker modal
